1: ba'i gzugs dag ni//sku gnyis ldan par <mistake>spo</mistake> <mistake>bya'o//bta</mistake> gar ling <mistake>g</mistake> <mistake>bcu</mistake> <mistake>gnas</mistake> su//de la <mistake>bha</mistake> yig <mistake>bsgoma</mistake> par <mistake>bya/pad+ma</mistake> 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag <mistake>ni//ku</mistake> gnyis ldan pa spro <mistake>bya'o//bha</mistake> gar ling <mistake>g</mistake>
2: bcug nas <mistake>su//da</mistake> <mistake>la tr</mistake> yig bsgom par bya//nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod//sku gnyis ldan pa <mistake>spo</mistake> <mistake>bya'o//bha</mistake> gar ling <mistake>gbcug</mistake> nas <mistake>su//dal</mistake> <mistake>zhuM</mistake> yig bsgom par <mistake>bya//zhuM</mistake> <mistake>mdad</mistake> <mistake>'dra'i</mistake> <mistake>gzug</mistake> dag
3: ni//sku gnyis ldan par <mistake>sbpo</mistake> <mistake>bya'o//hes</mistake> bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nyid gsang ba gsang <mistake>tchen</mistake> <mistake>yang //nying</mistake> po yongs su grags pa yin//snying pos rjes su 'grub
4: pa <mistake>na//nye</mistake> ba'i snying por yongs grags so//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma <mistake>pa de</mistake> ba'i mchog las gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de la ji
5: ltar bcom ldan <mistake>'angs</mistake> bde ba chen po <mistake>dang/rdo</mistake> rje don yod pa'i <mistake>dams</mistake> <mistake>tsheg</mistake> gi rgyud <mistake>yinzhe</mistake> <mistake>na/ kan</mistake> 'grub zad <mistake>mad</mistake> bde ba ni//de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste//don yod <mistake>damtshig</mistake> 'da' dka' <mistake>yin//dala</mistake> ji ltar
6: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor <mistake>ro//de</mistake> ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin//'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur <mistake>pa//de</mistake> 'dra'i dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin//
7: de la ji ltar <mistake>com</mistake> ldan <mistake>'angs</mistake> <mistake>rnams</mistake> smin <mistake>kgyi</mistake> rgyu yin zhe na/rdo rje sems dpa' sogs <mistake>la</mistake> yi//dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las//ci 'dra <mistake>b rtag</mistake> pa'i bsod nams su//phyi ni de bzhin <mistake>bro</mistake> bya'o//
8: de la ji ltar thig <mistake>gda</mistake> pa'i <mistake>chog</mistake> shes pa <mistake>yi'he</mistake> na/mkhas pas <mistake>kyil</mistake> 'khor bri bya <mistake>m/mtshams</mistake> kun <mistake>mnam</mistake> por <mistake>'den</mistake> par bya//shar dang nub dang byang sogs <mistake>phyogs /thig</mistake> skud bzhi pa re'u mig
